Commands Required: git checkout main; git merge claude/review-master-prompt --no-ff
git checkout backend; git merge main
git checkout frontend; git merge main

Description: Decide to keep or delete backend branch
Commands Required: git branch -d backend; git push origin --delete backend

Description: Decide to keep or delete frontend branch
Commands Required: git branch -d frontend; git push origin --delete frontend
git tag v1.0.0; git push origin v1.0.0
